name: ComplimentMonkey-MonkeySayMonkeyTrue
0:
”Alexa open compliment monkey”
”Alexa ask compliment monkey for a funny compliment”
”Alexa tell compliment monkey to give me a deserved compliment”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: compliment monkey
des:
Ask for well deserved compliment from the expert and truthful Compliment Monkey, and learn what makes you so special. You are after all a diamond in the rough.

Compliment Monkey provides an over the top compliment, often hilarious and funny that will make you go bananas with happiness.

Guaranteed to put a big monkey grin on your face, anytime!

Compliment Monkey geekily uses the latest Alexa Presentation Language technology to bring you the perfect text whether it's on your Echo Spot or the new Echo Show 5.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Compliment Monkey", "Alexa, open Compliment Monkey" to get a funny compliment. You can of course, being an over achiever could also use longer commands like "Alexa, tell Compliment Monkey to give me a well deserved compliment.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

NB: We are continuously adding new compliments so be sure to visit the Compliment Monkey regularly or better still, add the Compliment Monkey to your daily routine!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
